```{.python code-line-numbers="1-2|4-5|8|10-11"}
def reverseString(s):
    # Base case
    if len(s) <= 1:
        return s
    
    # Recursive step
    last_char = s[-1]
    rest_of_string = s[:-1]
    
    return last_char + reverseString(rest_of_string)

# Example:
reversed_hello = reverseString("hello")
print(reversed_hello)

```
